#installing necessary packages:
#install.packages("sf")
#install.packages("spData")

#loading necessary libraries:
library(spData)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(units)

#loading in the "world" data and "states" boundaries:
data(world)
data(us_states)

#plotting world and states:
plot(world[1])
plot(us_states[1])

#transforming world data to the albers equal area projection:
albers_world <- world %>%
  mutate(albers="+proj=aea         +lat_1=29.5 +lat_2=45.5 +lat_0=37.5 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs")

#checking that this worked:
View(albers_world)
plot(albers_world[1])

#filtering world data to only include canada:
world_canada <- albers_world %>%
  filter(name_long == "Canada")
  
#checking again that this worked:
View(world_canada)
plot(world_canada[1])

#buffer canada to 10km??

#transforming us_state data to the albers equal area projection:
albers_us <- us_states %>%
  mutate(albers="+proj=aea +lat_1=29.5 +lat_2=45.5 +lat_0=37.5 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs")

#filtering us_data to only include nys:  
us_nys <- albers_us %>%
  filter(NAME == "New York")

#checking that this worked:
plot(us_nys[1])

?st_intersection()
